titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-(2H-Benzotriazol-2-yl)-4,6-bis(1,1-dimethylpropyl)phenol.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/24/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-(2H-Benzotriazol-2-yl)-4,6-bis(1,1-dimethylpropyl)phenol.
